name: Key 1
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched bigfont rounded" style="background-color:#333333" ng-click="send({payload: '1' })"> 
<svg width="105px" height="105px" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 200 200">
 <g id="Key-1">
  <rect fill="#4D4D4D" width="200" height="200" rx="12" ry="12"/>
  <path fill="none" stroke="#B3B3B3" stroke-width="7.99957" d="M6 194c-1,-1 -2,-3 -2,-6l0 -176c0,-4 4,-8 8,-8l176 0c2,0 4,1 6,2"/>
  <path fill="none" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="7.99957" d="M194 6c1,1 2,3 2,6l0 176c0,4 -4,8 -8,8l-176 0c-2,0 -4,-1 -6,-2"/>
  <text x="59" y="153" style="fill: #E6E6E6; font-weight: normal; font-size: 150px; font-family: Arial;">1</text>
 </g>
</svg>
</md-button>

format:

  </rect>
  <path fill="none" stroke="#B3B3B3" stroke-width="7.99957" d="M6 194c-1,-1 -2,-3 -2,-6l0 -176c0,-4 4,-8 8,-8l176 0c2,0 4,1 6,2"/>
